This is the last post summarizing the Resources for the Future Climate Insights 2024 Report. Today, the focus is on the desired effort to deal with global warming.
We covered most - but not all - of the responses in the report. For anyone interested in reading the report in its entirety here’s the link:
Climate Insights 2024 Report
Next week I’ll encapsulate what the report’s findings say about the climate movement’s messaging strategy. I’ll also offer my take as to what changes I believe need to be made to win over more hearts and minds, and more importantly, get a greater number of people to take action.
